definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: You will begin to see that the joy is only in you abiding as your very own Self.
sentences.chinese: 你将开始领悟到喜悦仅仅是驻留于真我中。

sentences.english: When you have a realization, write it down in your journal.
sentences.chinese: 当你有所领悟时，把它们记在你的日记里。

sentences.english: Suddenly all the tension seemed to leave my body as the truth of what he said hit me.
sentences.chinese: 找领悟了他话中的道理，浑身的紧张顿时消失了。

sentences.english: Realise this deeply, carry it in your heart when you walk the world.
sentences.chinese: 要透彻地领悟到这一点，在你窗荡世界时铭记于心。

sentences.english: He who fully comprehends the method is a mathematician. Music has much resemblance to algebra.
sentences.chinese: 数学家是能完全领悟数学方法的人。

sentences.english: Try to follow the story line of comedy shows.
sentences.chinese: 尝试着去领悟一些喜剧影片的故事情节。

sentences.english: And in their primitivity and innocence, they value what they thus immediately apprehend.
sentences.chinese: 他们纯朴而天真，珍贵他们如此直接领悟的东西。

sentences.english: With a heart susceptible to taste, to understand phenomena in the world.
sentences.chinese: 用一颗易感的心去品味，去领悟世间百态。

sentences.english: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that enclosees your understanding.
sentences.chinese: 你们的痛苦就是那破壳而出的领悟。

sentences.english: He has just cottoned on to the fact that he might have dealt with the matter more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他这才领悟本来他处理这件事是可以更细致些的。

sentences.english: Jun Baoling realizes recipe, achieve a shadowboxing, incognito Zhang Sanfeng.
sentences.chinese: 君宝领悟秘诀，创出太极拳，改名张三丰。

sentences.english: The voyage is one of self-discovery and self-realization
sentences.chinese: 这次远行是一种自我发现和自我领悟的朝圣之旅。

sentences.english: Many of you already at soul level know of that which I exhort.
sentences.chinese: 你们许多人已在灵魂层面领悟我的忠告。

sentences.english: That was the meaning of Christmas, he realized.
sentences.chinese: 他领悟到，这就是圣诞节的重要性吧。

sentences.english: The great winds came and took them up into themselves.
sentences.chinese: 大风起兮，带它们领悟自我的真谛去了。

sentences.english: And a student needs to be hardworking, intelligent and diligent.
sentences.chinese: 那学生也得要记得努力，有领悟力及勤奋。

definition: to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
